nodes.text: Dinwa Prime was a planet located in the galaxy. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the world suffered terrible atrocities that were committed in the name of Emperor Palpatine, prompting a female insurgent to transmit rebellious propaganda from Lothal. In 3 BBY, Senator Bail Organa listed Dinwa Prime as a potential candidate for a humanitarian mission for his daughter Leia Organa. However, she crossed Dinwa Prime off the list.

During the Galactic Civil War, whilst speaking with rebel pilot Wedge Antilles, the former TIE fighter pilot Thane Kyrell mentioned Dinwa Prime alongside Arieli, Ivera X, and Zeitooine as worlds where the Empire had committed war crimes.
